---
runtime: shiny
---
```{r echo=FALSE}
data(iris)
selectInput("flower_choice", "Choose your flower", 
            choices = unique(iris$Species))

## unique(iris$species) is grabbing the unique values from the Species column in the iris data
## set. We are therefore giving the user the option to select between the different values of
## Species.
```

```{r}
renderText({
  selected = iris[iris$Species == input$flower_choice, ]
  mean(selected$Petal.Width)
})
```

```{r}
renderPlot({
  selected = iris[iris$Species == input$flower_choice, ]
  plot(selected$Petal.Width, selected$Petal.Length)
})
```
